# intensity

**Instance Property**

The intensity of the sepia effect.

## Declaration

```swift
var intensity: Float { get set }
```

## Discussion

A value of 1.0 creates a monochrome sepia image. A value of 0.0 has no effect on the image.

## Instance Properties

- **inputImage**: The image to use as an input image.

items.description: The image to use as an input image.
